alert.note: Alert for Lee; Phillips (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 5:43PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Lee and northern Phillips Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 543 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Marianna, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Marianna, Moro, Aubrey, Haynes, Garret Grove, Gill, Oak Forest, Westor, Big Creek Corner, Four Forks, Felton, Thomasville, Scott Valley and Mississippi River State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
